title: Arabic 38
text: Walk in My statutes for love of Me and deny thyself that which thou desirest if thou seekest My pleasure.

prev.title: Arabic 37
prev.text: Divest not thyself of My beauteous robe, and forfeit not thy portion from My wondrous fountain, lest thou shouldst thirst forevermore.

next.title: Arabic 39
next.text: Neglect not My commandments if thou lovest My beauty, and forget not My counsels if thou wouldst attain My good pleasure.
